input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to write an etsy review?
input_text.Response A:
Go to “Your Account” → “Purchases & Reviews.” Scroll down to find the order that you would like to review.
Select a star rating for the first item you would like to review.
Write a review for the item.
Click “Post Your Review.” Your review will be viewable on the seller’s page as well as the item page!
Repeat for each item.
input_text.Response B: Sure, you can just type in a few words or phrases about the product you bought, or about the service you received.  You can also include a photo of the item if you’d like.  You can also write a longer review if you’d like, but it’s not required.  I recommend you include some information about the product you bought, and also about the service you received.  You can also write about the quality of the product, and whether or not you’d recommend it to others.  You can also write about the customer service you received, whether it was helpful or not.  You can also write about the overall experience you had with the shop, whether it was good or bad.
